notes: Interrupts the user's channeling spells upon cast.

additionalInformation: When randoming a hero, the hero starts with a free, unsellable Faerie Fire.
Faerie Fires do not stack in the inventory. Each bought instance requires its own slot. The attack damage from multiple instances fully stacks.
The attack damage from multiple instances fully stacks.
Faerie Fire is not shareable and cannot be used on allies.
name: Faerie Fire
description: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.
tips: For the mid-laner, Faerie Fire can create an advantage over the enemy, as well as save him from a gank.
When diving past a tier 1 tower in the laning phase, a Fairie Fire can restore enough health to withstand one more tower hit, which can help you get the kill or retreat if need be.
